p: In summary, because of the nature of COVID-19 and the global emergency, many ongoing clinical studies are of suboptimal quality [ 1]. Prospective meta-analysis can serve as an innovative solution to generate reliable data for guiding clinical management and regulatory decision-making [ 9]. However, the success of this approach requires deep understanding of the principle and methodology of the prospective meta-analysis, significant efforts to organize the consortium, and the solidarity that individual investigators will be willing to share their own data.
